userStories.title: Reorganize routes module into subdirectories
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the routes module organized into logical subdirectories so that I can easily find and modify specific handlers.

userStories.title: Extract route handlers into separate modules by domain
userStories.description: As a developer, I want route handlers grouped by domain (url, auth, admin) so I can quickly locate the code for a specific endpoint.

userStories.title: Extract router configuration into separate module
userStories.description: As a developer, I want router setup (rate limiting, CORS, middleware) in a dedicated module so changes to routing don't require scrolling through handler code.

userStories.title: Extract route-specific types and responses
userStories.description: As a developer, I want request/response types specific to routes in a separate module so the type definitions don't clutter the handler code.

userStories.title: Move AppState to dedicated state module
userStories.description: As a developer, I want application state management in a dedicated module so the shared state structure is clearly documented and easy to modify.

userStories.title: Refactor config.rs into focused submodules
userStories.description: As a developer, I want configuration split into logical sections (server, database, cache, rate limiting) so I can quickly find and modify specific config areas.

userStories.title: Extract server startup logic from main.rs
userStories.description: As a developer, I want server startup logic in a separate module so main.rs focuses only on CLI parsing and application entry.

userStories.title: Extract short code generation to dedicated service
userStories.description: As a developer, I want short code generation logic in a dedicated module so it's reusable and testable independently from HTTP handlers.

userStories.title: Create utilities module for shared helpers
userStories.description: As a developer, I want a centralized utilities module for shared helper functions that don't belong in any specific domain module.

userStories.title: Update CLAUDE.md with new file structure
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the documentation to reflect the new codebase organization so future contributors can understand the updated structure.
